metadata.comments: This playbook will collect sentinel incident evidence (aka 'Events') and send them and the alerts to EventHub. 3rd party SIEM can connect to the above EventHub and save this data to farther analysis.
metadata.author: Yaniv Shasha

body.ContentData:
@{base64(concat('"{','
','"Alert Display Name": "',items('For_each')?['properties']?['alertDisplayName'],'",','
','"Product Name":"',items('For_each')?['properties']?['productName'],'",','
','"Incident_Entities":"',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['relatedEntities'],'",','
','"AlertsDescription": "',items('For_each')['properties']['description'],'",','
','"Severity":"',items('For_each')['properties']['severity'],'",','
','"Incident Url":"',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['incidentUrl'],'",','
','"Incident Owner":"',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['owner'],'",','
','"Incident Description":"',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['description'],'",','
','"Incident Title":"',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['title'],'",','
','"Incident comment":"',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['Comments'],'"','
','"Alert Time":"',items('For_each')['properties']['timeGenerated'],'",','
','"Alert Resource Group":"',items('For_each')['properties']['resourceIdentifiers'][0]['resourceGroup'],'",','
','"Alert Subscription Id":"',items('For_each')['properties']['resourceIdentifiers'][0]['subscriptionId'],'",','
','"Alert type":"',items('For_each')['properties']['productComponentName'],'",','
','"Provider Alert ID":"',items('For_each')['properties']['providerAlertId'],'"','
','"Alert Start Time":"',items('For_each')['properties']['startTimeUtc'],'",','
','"Alert End Time":"',items('For_each')['properties']['endTimeUtc'],'",','
','"Events":"',body('Parse_JSON_3'),'",','
','}"','
','
','
'))}
